text: L'estro armonico (English: "The Harmonic Inspiration"), Op. 3, is a set of violin concertos written by Antonio Vivaldi. It was written for Ferdinando de' Medici, Grand Prince of Tuscany. It was published in 1711 in Amsterdam. It was very popular. The concertos are often used to teach playing the violin. == References == Category:Violin concertos Category:Compositions by Antonio Vivaldi
title: L'estro armonico
